name: The Stars Above Us
description:
"I don't know how to play! Help me!"

Do you see those shooting stars? Click them!

Play with:

 OR  

In "The Stars Above Us" you can watch shooting stars fall from the sky as you read the latest news.

It is a quiet environment where you can relax listening to chill music.

This video game was developed for Weekly Game Jam # 135 and as a university project.

You can follow my networks to see my other games:
Twitter: @StivArtsDev
Youtube: StivArts
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/StivArtsDev/

Enjoy and feel comfortable leaving me a comment.
